item.title: Report X-2024010517
item.description:
Report X-2024010517

Identified by scraper @ 2024-02-06T18:12:07+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-01-05
  • City: BELEN
  • State: NM
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: BRGX 676 was found in the Belen, NM yard by an FRA inspector to have wet staining on the top of the car. Upon inspection by the BNSF responder, the manway gasket was pinched/misaligned, causing the leakage. The gasket was replaced and the car released into transportation.
